column2: Poor Fighter
Trained Fighter
Skilled Fighter
Formidable Fighter
This character understands the basics of combat, but is sloppy, overconfident, and inexperienced.
This character has received training in the art of combat. While no master, they can hold their own in a fight.
This character possesses a certain talent for battle and swordfights.
This character is one of the greatest warriors in the known world, favored by the gods and dreaded on the battlefield.
You asked [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] to teach you how to fight better with a sword.
I will become a great warrior!
You asked [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] to teach you how to fight even better with a sword.
You want [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] to help you TRULY master the art of swordmanship!
Under my guidance, my young [GetFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName], is slowly mastering the art of swordsmanship.
I have accidently injured my son in training!
My father accidently injured me in training!
By forcing my son to fight, I made him a better man!
My father forced me to train with him... I didn't want to, but I did learn something. Luckily I didn't get hurt!
Force [This.GetBestName] to train.
Force [This.GetBestName] to train.
Force [This.GetBestName] to train.
Force [This.GetBestName] to train.
Force [This.GetBestName] to learn how to fight, by teaching him yourself.
Force [This.GetBestName] to keep learning how to fight, by teaching him yourself.
Force [This.GetBestName] to keep learning how to fight, by teaching him yourself.
Force [This.GetBestName] to keep learning how to fight, by teaching him yourself.
The sword in my hand seems heavier and heavier every year...
'...tempus fugit...'
